metadata.title: CVE-2020-21686 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-use-after-scope issue discovered in expand_mmac_params function inpreproc.c in nasm before 2.15.04 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service via crafted asm file.

criterions.comment: nasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
